tidbits.title: Island Paradise
tidbits.description: The Bahamas is an archipelago of over 700 islands, renowned for its stunning beaches, crystal-clear waters, and vibrant marine life, attracting tourists seeking a tropical paradise.

tidbits.title: Pirate History
tidbits.description: The Bahamas has a rich pirate history, with legends of famous pirates like Blackbeard and stories of hidden treasures, adding intrigue to its past.

tidbits.title: Junkanoo Festival
tidbits.description: The Junkanoo Festival, a vibrant celebration of music, dance, and colorful costumes, is a hallmark of Bahamian culture, held during the holiday season.
